Game: Ratatouille- Food Frenzy 2007-10-29T00:00:00-07:00 Ratatouille: Food Frenzy is a cookery simulation-styled minigame compilation video game developed by Helixe and published by THQ for the Nintendo DS. It was released in North America on October 29, 2007, in Europe on February 15, 2008, and in Japan on February 21, 2008. It is based on the film Ratatouille. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/a10431d7-99a3-4330-bde7-01e0502477ad.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/ea6d7821-7072-4013-8fd2-2a0cd97b2dce.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/4f12bd07-1588-497c-b2d4-0a0286b05d74.png http://images.launchbox-app.com/0081bed8-65e3-4518-a50e-2727f7830790.png https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ratatouille:_Food_Frenzy Construction and Management Simulation Helixe THQ
